title: Orange Vitality Crystals
description: Support your immune system on-the-go with delicious orange-flavored Emergen-C Orange Vitality Crystals. Rip, tip, pour, and feel the pop, no water needed!
cleaned_text: No water? No problem! Get the goodness of Emergen-C in a new, mouthwatering, crystal popping experience. Made to be used daily in a delicious orange flavor. Add a little pop to your day with this fun, new way to get your immune support.* You'll get: - High potency Vitamin C - B vitamins to enhance energy naturally* - Antioxidants like zinc, manganese and Vitamin C to help you emerge your best
